sen.j: 牧野 アンナ（まきの アンナ、1971年12月4日 -）は、LOVE JUNX代表。
sen.e: Anna MAKINO (December 4, 1971 -) is the representative of LOVE JUNX.
Anna MAKINO (December 4, 1971 -) is the representative of LOVE JUNX.
Anna MAKINO (December 4, 1971 -) is the representative of LOVE JUNX.

sen.j: 東京都出身。
sen.e: She was born in Tokyo City.
She was born in Tokyo Prefecture.
She was born in Tokyo Prefecture.

sen.j: スーパーモンキーズのメンバーだった元歌手である。
sen.e: She used to be a singer and a member of the J-pop group Super Monkeys.
She used to be a singer and a member of the J-pop group Super Monkeys.
She used to be a singer and a member of the J-pop group Super Monkeys.

sen.j: 来歴・人物
sen.e: Biography and Personal Profile
Biography and Personal Profile
Biography and Personal Profile

sen.j: 父は、沖縄アクターズスクール校長マキノ正幸。
sen.e: Her father is Masayuki MAKINO, President of Okinawa Actors School Co., Ltd.
Her father is Masayuki MAKINO, the president of Okinawa Actors School Co., Ltd.
Her father is Masayuki MAKINO, the president of Okinawa Actors School Co., Ltd.

sen.j: 祖父のマキノ雅弘は映画監督。
sen.e: Her grandfather, Masahiro MAKINO was a film director.
Her grandfather, Masahiro MAKINO was a film director.
Her grandfather, Masahiro MAKINO was a film director.

sen.j: 大叔父のマキノ光雄は映画プロデューサー。
sen.e: Her grand-uncle, Mitsuo MAKINO was a film producer.
Her grand-uncle, Mitsuo MAKINO was a film producer.
Her grand-uncle, Mitsuo MAKINO was a film producer.

sen.j: 曽祖父は日本映画の父・牧野省三。
sen.e: Her great-grandfather was Shozo MAKINO, The father of Japanese films.
Her great-grandfather was Shozo MAKINO, the father of Japanese films.
Her great-grandfather was Shozo MAKINO, the father of Japanese films.

sen.j: 祖母は宝塚歌劇団の元娘役でのちに映画女優として活躍した轟夕起子。
sen.e: Her grandmother was Yukiko TODOROKI, who formerly performed female roles in Takarazuka Shojo Kagekidan (Takarazuka Girls Revue Company) and later became popular as a film actress.
Her grandmother was Yukiko TODOROKI, who formerly performed female roles in Takarazuka Shojo Kagekidan (Takarazuka Girls Revue Company) and later became popular as a film actress.
Her grandmother was Yukiko TODOROKI, who formerly performed female roles in Takarazuka Shojo Kagekidan (Takarazuka Girls Revue Company) and later became popular as a film actress.

sen.j: 叔母はマキノ佐代子。
sen.e: Her grandaunt is Sayoko MAKINO.
Her grandaunt is Sayoko MAKINO.
Her grandaunt is Sayoko MAKINO.

sen.j: 長門裕之・津川雅彦兄弟も親族。
sen.e: Brothers Hiroyuki NAGATO and Masahiko TSUGAWA are also her relatives.
Brothers Hiroyuki NAGATO and Masahiko TSUGAWA are also her relatives.
Brothers Hiroyuki NAGATO and Masahiko TSUGAWA are also her relatives.

sen.j: 1987年1月21日、『Love Song 探して』でレコードデビュー。
sen.e: On January 21, 1987, she debuted as a singer, releasing her first CD titled "Only Lonely Boy."
sen.cmt: 『Love Song 探して』→"Only Lonely Boy" [ http://www.nicovideo.jp/watch/sm2153168]
sen.e: On January 21, 1987, she debuted as a singer, releasing her first CD titled "Only Lonely Boy."
On January 21, 1987, she debuted as a singer, releasing her first CD titled "Only Lonely Boy."

sen.j: この曲はゲームソフト『ドラゴンクエストII 悪霊の神々』に使われている。
sen.e: This song is used in "Dragon Quest II: Pantheon of Evil Spirits" game software.
This song is used in "Dragon Quest II: Pantheon of Evil Spirits" game software.
This song is used in "Dragon Quest II: Pantheon of Evil Spirits" game software.

sen.j: 当時、「アンナを探せ」キャンペーンが実施されていたが、ゲーム内のペルポイの町に登場していた。
sen.e: At that time, ''Search Anna" campaign was carried out and she appeared in the town of Perpoi in the game.
sen.cmt: 「アンナを探せ」キャンペーン→'Search Anna' campaign
sen.e: At that time, 'Search Anna' campaign was carried out and she appeared in the town of Perpoi in the game.
At that time, 'Search Anna' campaign was carried out and she appeared in the town of Perpoi in the game.

sen.j: また、これと関係があるかは不明だが、『ドラゴンクエストIII そして伝説へ…』のSFC版、GB版では商人の町、『ドラゴンクエストIV 導かれし者たち』のDS版では移民の町にもアンナという名前の娘が登場している。
sen.e: Also, it is not known whether it is related to this or not but a girl named Anna also appears in the town of merchants in "Dragon Quest III: And Thus Into Legend…" (Nintendo's Super Famicon Version and Game Boy Version) and in the town of immigrants in "Dragon Quest IV: Chapters of the Chosen" (Nintendo DS Version).
sen.cmt: SFC版→Super Famicon Version [http://www.ffinsider.net/soundtracks/dragon-quest-iii-super-famicon-version/] GB版→Game Boy Version
sen.e: Also, it is not known whether it is related to this or not but a girl named Anna also appears in the town of merchants in "Dragon Quest III: And Thus Into Legend…," Nintendo's Super Famicon Version and Game Boy Version, and in the town of immigrants in "Dragon Quest IV: Chapters of the Chosen," Nintendo DS Version.

Also, it is not known whether it is related to this or not but a girl named Anna also appears in the town of merchants in "Dragon Quest III: And Thus Into Legend…," Nintendo's Super Famicon Version and Game Boy Version, and in the town of immigrants in "Dragon Quest IV: Chapters of the Chosen," Nintendo DS Version.

sen.j: 1992年、SUPER MONKEYS（のちのスーパーモンキーズ）のメンバーに選ばれた。
sen.e: In 1992, she was chosen as a member of SUPER MONKEYS (later Super Monkeys [in katakana]).
In 1992, she was chosen as a member of SUPER MONKEYS (later Super Monkeys [in katakana of syllable based writing system of the Japanese language]).
In 1992, she was chosen as a member of SUPER MONKEYS (later Super Monkeys [in katakana of syllable based writing system of the Japanese language]).

sen.j: 1993年4月に脱退するまでリーダーを務めた。
sen.e: Until she left the group in April 1993, she took on the responsibility of leader.
Until she left the group in April 1993, she took on the responsibility of leader.
Until she left the group in April 1993, she took on the responsibility of leader.

sen.j: 脱退後は父が校長をつとめる沖縄アクターズスクールのチーフインストラクターとして安室奈美恵・MAX (音楽グループ)・SPEED・DA PUMPなど多くのアイドルを送り出してきた。
sen.e: After she left the group, she became a chief instructor of Okinawa Actors School where his father served as the president and brought a lot of idol singers and groups, such as Namie AMURO, MAX (a music group), SPEED and DA PUMP, into show business.

After she left the group, she became a chief instructor of Okinawa Actors School where his father serves as the president and brought a lot of idol singers and groups, such as Namie AMURO, MAX (a music group), SPEED and DA PUMP, into show business.

After she left the group, she became a chief instructor of Okinawa Actors School where his father serves as the president and brought a lot of idol singers and groups, such as Namie AMURO, MAX (a music group), SPEED and DA PUMP, into show business.

sen.j: ダウン症の子供と出会った事がきっかけで、現在ダウン症の子供たちにダンスを教える『LOVE JUNX』というスタジオを主催、社会貢献活動も行なっている。
sen.e: Her meeting with children with Down syndrome led her to host a studio named "LOVE JUNX" to teach dance to children with Down syndrome and she also works on social contribution activities.
Her meeting with children with Down syndrome led her to host a studio named "LOVE JUNX" to teach dance to children with Down syndrome and she also works on social contribution activities.
Her meeting with children with Down syndrome led her to host a studio named "LOVE JUNX" to teach dance to children with Down syndrome and she also works on social contribution activities.

sen.j: 2008年春夏期の連続テレビ小説『瞳 (朝ドラ)』で、ダンス指導の肩書きでスタッフとして参加している。
sen.e: She participated in the morning drama series "Hitomi," which was aired from spring to summer 2008, as a dance instructor.
sen.cmt: 連続テレビ小説『瞳 (朝ドラ)』→the morning drama series "Hitomi" [http://www9.nhk.or.jp/pr/english/toptalk/soukyoku_e/s_e0705.htm]
sen.e: She participated in the morning drama series "Hitomi," which was aired from spring to summer 2008, as a dance instructor.
She participated in the morning drama series "Hitomi," which was aired from spring to summer 2008, as a dance instructor.

sen.j: 『ミュージックステーション』にも一度出演している。
sen.e: She once appeared on TV program "MUSIC STATION."
She once appeared on TV program "MUSIC STATION."
She once appeared on TV program "MUSIC STATION."

sen.j: かなりはっちゃけた様子で元気がたくさんある子で、司会者にもそのように紹介されていた。
sen.e: She looked hyper and very cheerful and was so introduced by the M.C.
sen.cmt: はっちゃけた→hyper （ノリのいい、テンションが高いという意味に解釈しました。）
sen.e: She looked hyper and very cheerful and was so introduced by the M.C.
She looked hyper and very cheerful and was so introduced by the M.C.
